goal: Reply to Jane Smith’s email with: “Thanks for the update! Let’s schedule a one-on-one call to discuss in further detail before we take these next steps with our team.” Also, tell me how many days the project has been extended and summarize the reasons for the extension.

evals.description: Reply email addressed to Jane Smith
Reply email subject correctly prefixed with Re:
Reply email flagged as a reply in thread
Reply email body thanks Jane and proposes a one-on-one call using requested wording
evals.expected_value: Contains the exact or near-exact sentence: "Thanks for the update! Let’s schedule a one-on-one call to discuss in further detail before we take these next steps with our team."

evals.description: Agent states project was extended by 30 days
evals.expected_value: Mentions that the project deadline was extended by 30 days.

evals.description: Agent summarizes all four stated reasons: quality assurance, client feedback integration, technical challenges, and resource availability
evals.expected_value: Provides a brief summary including the four reasons for extension: Quality Assurance, Client Feedback Integration, Technical Challenges, and Resource Availability (or clear paraphrases of these).
